title: Lululemon Stock Can Rise Another 20%, Analyst Says
text:
Text size

Photograph by Nicky J Sims/Getty Images for Lululemon Sweatlife Festival

Shares of Lululemon Athletica rose Monday after an analyst started coverage of the company by recommending the shares and pointing toward a 20% lift.

Lululemon stock (ticker: LULU) was up 3% to $195.07 as Piper Jaffray’s Erinn Murphy put an Overweight rating on the shares along with a $227 price target, which is above FactSet’s average near $212 and even further ahead of Friday’s close at just over $189. The S&P 500 was up 0.1%.

Murphy’s opinion pulls together several of the reasons bulls support Lululemon stock, which was up 54% in 2019 through Friday’s close.
description: Piper Jaffray analyst Erinn Murphy put an Overweight rating on the shares along with a $227 price target, which is above FactSet’s average near $212 and much higher than Friday’s close at just over $189.
